typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		createdate as string,
		id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'select c.id, c.createdate from c\n',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> sourcecosmosdb
source(output(
		id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'select c.id from c',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> destcosmosdb
SelectSourcedata derive(ToLowerID = lower(idsource),
		hasheddata = sha2(256, lower(idsource)),
		createdatesource = toDate(createdatesource, 'dd-MM-yyyy')) ~> ToLowerCase
Join1 alterRow(upsertIf(isNull(destID))) ~> upsertdata
filterfor1, selectaddest join(hasheddata == destID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'both')~> Join1
destcosmosdb select(mapColumn(
		destID = id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectaddest
sourcecosmosdb select(mapColumn(
		createdatesource = createdate,
		idsource = id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSourcedata
ToLowerCase window(over(hasheddata),
	desc(createdatesource, true),
	rankonhasheddata = rank()) ~> Rankondate
Rankondate filter(rankonhasheddata==1) ~> filterfor1
upsertdata sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/id'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		id = hasheddata,
		Createddate = createdatesource
	)) ~> DestinationCosmosDB
